overview: Palisade is a short film about a man named Lloyd who robs a convenience store to help his girlfriend out of debt. To escape the cops, Lloyd breaks into a  woman's home, locks himself in her bedroom and holds her cat hostage. The pair develop an odd friendship through the locked bedroom door.  This film is a comedy of errors that explores the polarities of compatibility, and demonstrates the power of attraction over circumstance.
title: Palisade
